channel.title: Really need help on invisionfree boards
channel.description:
Okay, so we only have 10 members, now, but i worked hard on the skin and such, and it's fairly active for number of users. I wanna go and change the Personal Photo for myself, (I'm the administrator) and it said "the board administrator has now allowed your permissions to edit this section" or something like that. My question is, how do I allow Administrators to change other members/their own personal photo?
Help appreciated!

item.title: Really need help on invisionfree boards
